mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.name, p.price, p.use_amount, CONVERT(p.dsc USING utf8) AS dsc, p.reg_date, dt.depth2, do.depth1, p.depth2_id, do.id AS depth1_id FROM product AS p INNER JOIN c_depth2 AS dt ON dt.id=p.depth2_id INNER JOIN c_depth1 AS do ON dt.depth1_id=do.id WHERE p.id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (name, price, dsc, use_amount, reg_date, depth2_id) VALUES (#{name}, #{price}, #{dsc}, #{use_amount}, #{reg_date}, #{depth2_id})
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET name=#{name}, price=#{price}, dsc=#{dsc}, use_amount=#{use_amount}, depth2_id=#{depth2_id} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM product AS p INNER JOIN c_depth2 AS dt ON dt.id=p.depth2_id INNER JOIN c_depth1 AS do ON dt.depth1_id=do.id
p.name LIKE concat('%', #{name}, '%')
OR p.id LIKE concat('%', #{id}, '%')
